description: Oksana Lintz, troubled by Stenograd's turmoil and fearing further chaos if the truth gets out, discusses her dilemma with a trusted friend. She weighs triggering Mosaic Reversion to impose order against exposing BCI abuses.

Facing mounting crisis, Oksana discreetly authorizes the Mosaic Reversion: all BCI scores revert to their 2022 levels, instantly scrambling citizen privileges. She ensures this happens before rival factions can intervene.
BCI scores abruptly revert citywide. Residents find roles upended—many lose crucial access while others gain sudden influence. Confusion spreads as workplaces and neighborhoods reel from the shift.

Council infighting intensifies as power structures realign overnight. Oksana quietly begins tracking the aftermath, pressured by councilors to either explain the reset or help contain fallout and restore normalcy.

Impromptu citizen assemblies form across Stenograd, using the mural as a negotiation hub for new roles and services. Public debate grows over the future of scoring, with many demanding reform and accountability.
